{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Thoma
|date               = 2024-01-09
|zh                 = 
;今天是托马的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''托马生日快乐！为什么叫我们到这里呀？
:'''托马：'''有时候自己一个人的时候就坐到这里，看着茫茫的大海，不自觉会想起故乡的事情。
:'''旅行者：'''旧事，故人……
:'''托马：'''如果有人能理解我的心情，大概就只有你们了吧。
:'''派蒙：'''哎呀，哪里来的小猫咪！
:'''托马：'''小咪，今天已经吃过小零食啦，不可以贪吃哦。
:'''派蒙：'''它们一定是知道你今天过生日，约好了一起陪你庆生呢！
:'''旅行者：'''小猫咪们也希望你开心哦。
:'''托马：'''我很开心，谢谢你们。
|dialogue_review_zh = 「如果有人能理解我的心情，大概就只有你们了吧。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Thoma]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Paimon:''' Happy birthday, Thoma! Why did you invite us all the way out here?
:'''Thoma:''' Sometimes when I'm alone, I'll sit here and watch the open sea. And before I know it, I'll be thinking of my hometown.
:'''Traveler:''' Events and people from the past, huh...
:'''Thoma:''' If there's anyone that could understand how I feel, it would probably be you two.
:'''Paimon:''' Oh! Where did these kitty-cats come from?
:'''Thoma:''' Hey kitty, you've already had snacks today. We shouldn't be too greedy, okay?
:'''Paimon:''' Paimon thinks they know it's your birthday today! They came to celebrate together!
:'''Traveler:''' The little kitties want you to be happy too.
:'''Thoma:''' I'm very happy. Thanks, you guys.
|dialogue_review_en = "If there's anyone that could understand how I feel, it would probably be you two."
}}
